abstract: Series of wiretapped conversations are played at federal corruption trial of former New York State Senate majority leader Dean G Skelos and his son Adam; recordings document what prosecutors say are actions Skelos took to benefit his son, but they also show his animus toward Gov Andrew M Cuomo.
lead_paragraph: A series of riveting, raw wiretapped conversations were used to show what was going on behind the scenes as Dean G. Skelos voted on legislation that the government has said would benefit his son.

headline.main: Tapes Played at Skelos Corruption Trial Portray Strategy Used Against Democrats
headline.print_headline: Tapes Played at Skelos Corruption Trial Portray Strategy Used Against Democrats

snippet: A series of riveting, raw wiretapped conversations were used to show what was going on behind the scenes as Dean G. Skelos voted on legislation that the government has said would benefit his son.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
